lateststatstext: Your latest stats on the match
addacc_info: to add your PUBG account to the Discord, enter your PUBG name
specifyserver: specify the server you are playing on. Servers
addedacctodb: added the account to database with the PUBG nickname
changeaccdb: changed PUBG account to database with nickname
successaccchange: great! You have successfully linked your PUBG account to Discord
wrongaccname: you may have entered the wrong nickname in PUBG. Try again!
accnotlinked: you have not linked your PUBG account to the bot. Use
hasntplayed: this player has not played PUBG match yet.
namenotspecified: you haven't specified player name or match id. See commands
servernotspecified: you haven't specified match id or player name. See commands
listofmatches: the list of matches of the player
stats_channel: Specify channel id where stats will be displayed after the match
notify_dm_true: now bot **will** notify your stats after each match in **DM**
notify_server_true: now bot **will** notify your stats after each match in **Server**
notify_server_false: now bot **will not** notify your stats after each match in **Server**
notify_dm_false: now bot **will not** notify your stats after each match in **DM**
notify: Set location where to notify stats
notify_toggle_on: now bot **will** notify your stats after each match
notify_toggle_off: now bot **will not** notify your stats after each match
notify_toggle_server_error: on this server, the ability to post statistics to the channel is disabled. Instead, you will receive statistics in private messages.
notify_error: Due to an obscure error, I had to disable your match notifications. Please try again.
notify_server_forbid: your statistics cannot be published on this server.
